page.title: 18MRS TURNERS DAY
page.content: MRS J Turner is 68 years of age,she lives in a bungalow called "Maneaha", Damgate Lane Martham.She has a part time job in Martham on the Broads cleaning boats.This takes place on Saturdays between 9:30am_3:30pm. Mrs Turner,has a husband & 3 adult children,she also has brothers & sisters not living in this area. Mrs Turner wakes at 7:30am & has breakfast consisting of toast,marmite & tea.The morning's work starts at 8:30am she does hoovering,dusting, washing_up & making the beds.After the work lunch is prepared this is usually cheese,rolls,bacon etc. During the day she & her husband sometimes travel to Great Yarmouth or Acle.If not she listens to the radio while knitting.The evening meal is beef 3 vegetables,pudding.She later watches TV.She goes to bed at 11:30.
